alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 06 at 1:34PM MDT until September 07 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Afternoon high temperatures of 91 to 97 degrees. * WHERE...The Beaverhead Lemhi Highlands and Island Park region, including but not limited to Dubois, Spencer, Island Park, and Macks Inn. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or recreate outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or late evening. Drink plenty of fluids, wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing, take frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
